description: This file contains functions for managing system passwords, including updating the /etc/shadow file and generating encrypted passwords for admin and root users. It provides mechanisms to set and change passwords securely via scripted functions.

methods.name: update_shadow
methods.description: Updates the encrypted password for a specified user in /etc/shadow by replacing the old password with a new one.

methods.name: gen_admin_passwd
methods.description: Generates an encrypted password for the admin user based on a seed password and updates /etc/shadow.

methods.name: gen_root_passwd
methods.description: Generates an encrypted password for the root user based on a seed password and updates /etc/shadow.
